commitResults.messageTitle: Implement skeletal version of Duke
commitResults.messageBody:
The chatbot has a proper layout and can greet the user, echo a command,
and exit upon command.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add basic functionality of a task list
commitResults.messageBody:
Allow for adding tasks to a list, and upon command, display all items
in the list so far.

commitResults.messageTitle: Use a class to represent tasks
commitResults.messageBody:
Replaced the ArrayList of Strings with an array of Tasks to conform to
object-oriented design principles.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add the ability to mark tasks as done
commitResults.messageBody:
Implement new functions to mark as done and update design and messages
 to support the new functionality.

commitResults.messageTitle: Use Inheritance to support multiple task types
commitResults.messageBody:
There are similarities between the task types hence inheritance will
help reduce code duplication and also allow for polymorphism when
handling tasks.

Implement classes Todo, Deadline and Event that extends the Task
class.

commitResults.messageTitle: Reassign formatting of tasks and messages
commitResults.messageBody:
Tasks are formatted primarily by their own classes and other messages
are formatted by the appropriate functions.

commitResults.messageTitle: Allow users to create tasks from any of the task subtypes.
commitResults.messageBody:
Modify the input processing to look for specific keywords representing
 the subtype of Task to create, and add new messages to complement the
  creation of these tasks.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add automated Text UI Testing
commitResults.messageBody:
Using the I/O redirection technique, update the files in the
text-ui-test folder to compare intended output with actual output.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add error handling
commitResults.messageBody: Output the appropriate message when the user input is incorrect.

commitResults.messageTitle: Use exceptions to handle errors
commitResults.messageBody:
Where appropriate, create new exception classes. Throw exceptions and
catch them when suitable.

commitResults.messageTitle: Use ArrayList to store tasks rather than array
commitResults.messageBody:
The use of Arraylist eliminates the need to keep track of a count field
and an id field and eliminates the need for remapping if a task is
removed.

Modify all the functions to accept an arraylist instead of an array, and
 remove any redundant fields for the task class.

commitResults.messageTitle: Show a message if the user has already done a task
commitResults.messageBody:
Users should not be allowed to mark a task as done if they have already
done so for the same task.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add functionality for deleting tasks
commitResults.messageBody:
Users should have a way to clear tasks that have already been done or
cancelled or wrongly saved.

Create new functions and messages to delete any task from the existing
list.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add enum for task types
commitResults.messageBody:
Enum will ensure that the values for task type will be restricted to the
 types of tasks that are actually supported.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add ability to save to disk
commitResults.messageBody:
The user will likely want to retrieve the tasks he/she saved in the
previous session.

Hence, save the tasks of the current session to the user's system disk
and retrieve it on every initialisation.

commitResults.messageTitle: Incorporate Java date and time data types
commitResults.messageBody:
Existing tasks saves the date/time as strings which provides very little
 flexibility when converting to another format or performing operations
 on the date/time.

 Use specific date/time types to allow for further manipulation of the
 date/time than the existing strings.

commitResults.messageTitle: Refactor the code to extract out related code as classes
commitResults.messageBody:
Existing code has most of the primary functions and fields in a single
class. This does not conform to OOP principles.

Move the related members into classes of their own.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add unit tests for TaskList and Parser
commitResults.messageBody:
Allow for more comprehensive testing by creating test classes and
overriding equals() and hashcode() for the classes used in the tests to
facilitate the assertions.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add Javadoc to most non-private classes and methods.
commitResults.messageBody: Provide documentation of most of the existing code.

commitResults.messageTitle: Tweak the code ensure compliance with coding standard
Add find command
commitResults.messageBody:
Allow users to search for tasks in their list using a search query.

Implement the relevant ui and tasklist functions together with a new
command type.
